thing-type.description: Z-Wave Motor for water/gas ball valves<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThis valve clamps onto your existing valve, allowing you to open/close the valve via Z-Wave as soon as you notice a problem.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtWith controller in inclusion mode, triple-press valve button within 1 second to include.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtWith controller in exclusion mode, triple-press valve button within 1 second to exclude.</p&gt <p&gtHolding the valve button for more than 10 seconds resets to factory default settings.</p&gt
